rooms.name: Entrance Courtyard
rooms.description:
You are on the Entrance Courtyard, outside Hogwarts Castle.
You can go north to the Entrance Hall from here.

rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description:
You are in the Entrance Hall.
You see see the Great Hall to the north, the Entrance Courtyard to the south, and the Trophy Room to the east.

rooms.name: Trophy Room
rooms.description:
You are in the Trophy Room. You may grab one of your many Quidditch trophies.
You can see Umbridge's Office to the north, Entrance Hall, and the Quidditch Field south from here.

rooms.name: Umbridge's Office
rooms.description:
Oh no! You are in Headmaster Umbrige's Office.
She decided to confiscate all the items you have and send you back to the Entrance Courtyard.

rooms.name: Quidditch Field
rooms.description:
You are in the Quidditch Field. You can try and catch the snitch!
You can see the Viaduct to the north, the Trophy room, and the Owlery west from here.

rooms.name: Viaduct
rooms.description:
You are in the Viaduct, you hear the water running through.
You can see the Quidditch Field south from here and the Great Hall to the east.

rooms.name: Owlery
rooms.description:
You are in the Owlery. You never now when an Owl might be useful!
You can see the Quidditch Field to the east.

rooms.name: Great Hall
rooms.description:
You are in the Great Hall. Sit down and feast! You may want to grab some food for a potion.
You can see the Entrance Hall, the Clock Tower north, and the Viaduct to the west.

rooms.name: Clock Tower
rooms.description:
You are in the Clock Tower.
You can see the Great Hall, the Divination room to the east, and the Stone Bridge to the north

rooms.name: Divination Room
rooms.description:
You are in the Divination Room. Try to see what your future holds!
You can go west to the Clock Tower or north to the Stone Bridge

rooms.name: Stone Bridge
rooms.description:
You are in the Stone Bridge.
You can see Herbology north from here and the Divination room towards the south.

rooms.name: Herbology
rooms.description:
You are in Herbology, you may pick up herbs for brewing a potion.
You can go the Boy's Dormitory up here, the Potions room east from here, or Stone Bridge south.

rooms.name: Boy's Dormitory
rooms.description:
You are in the Boy's Dormitory, you may pick up some of your friends to come along with you.
You can see the Great Hall up the stairs and Herbology down the stairs

rooms.name: Potions Room
rooms.description:
You are in the room of Potions.
You can brew yourself a Revealing Potion if you have a frog and a Basil plant.
You can see the Room of Requirement down from here and the Herbology westward.

rooms.name: Room Of Requirement Door
rooms.description:
This is the entrance to the Door of Requirement.
The Room of requirement shall only be available to those who are winners, revealers, and united.
Do you have all of these items? If so you may enter.
Else, go back to the Potions Room up from here.

rooms.name: Room Of Requirement
rooms.description:
Huzzah! You made it to the secret Room of Requirement.
You and your friends may train here to save Hogwarts.
Congratulations!
